name: Beverly Suzanne Robb
seeking: Seeking wellness coaches, spiritual teachers, or retreat organizers who serve audiences interested in consciousness expansion and holistic personal transformation. JV partners in the global spiritual community—such as meditation platforms, plant medicine facilitators, or energy healing practitioners—would align with Alafia River Global Awakenings' mission. Cross-promotional deals with transformation-focused online summits or spiritual travel companies would help expand reach.
who_you_serve: Individuals seeking global spiritual awakening, personal transformation, and holistic wellness experiences.
what_you_do: Facilitates global spiritual awakening experiences and consciousness expansion through Alafia River programs.
offering: Beverly Suzanne. Providing expert solutions and support.
business_focus: Facilitates global spiritual awakening experiences and consciousness expansion through Alafia River programs.
